title: Which motion has an acceleration of zero?

content.description: For which of the following motions of an object must the acceleration always be zero?
content.question: I. Any motion in a straight lineII. Simple harmonic motionIII. Any motion in a circle

choices.label: Either I or III, but not II
None of these motions guarantees zero acceleration.

content.answer: None of these motions guarantees zero acceleration.
